name: Pokémon Mega Fire Red
overview: From the creator of Super Fire Red, this hack follows the same story as Pokémon Fire Red, with new features and Mega-Evolution, changes to some maps, etc. It is an expansion of Super Fire Red, being its newest version. Features: -Mega-Evolution. (Evolve with stone, permanent evo) -Improved graphics. -More double battles. -Gain exp by evolving pokemon.
